document_data.name: ''Scimitar of the Sultan''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''Scimitar of the Sultan''''' was a magical sword whose powers were boosted when in combat with undead.
document_data.Powers: While the enchantment on the sword was rather bare, it was boosted threefold when wielded against the undead.
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|1356}}, three ''Scimitars of the Sultan'' were offered as a down payment by Sheik [[Kassim Arslan]] to the adventurers he charged with finding and retrieving Princess [[Shadalah]], then missing.
